revised_title: Radar Innovations and Applications: A Clifford Paterson Lecture
tldr: This lecture discusses the history and advancements of radar technology during and after World War II. It covers the development of early warning systems, the invention of the cavity magnetron, and the use of radar in military applications. The lecture also touches on the challenges of electronic countermeasures and the need for improved radar systems.
